texts.text: Sandbox is a free-play mode that lets you fight against waves of enemies from the Wave Book.
Choose a destination on the map to travel
Survive as long as possible against waves of enemies! Grab weapons from your foes, or from the pedestals following each wave!
A big arena to fight in
Please stand straight and press both triggers to calibrate your height
Raise or lower chance to fight tougher opponents
Access all weapons and powers without restriction. Spawn enemies of your choice in arena-based environments or enter the dungeon in sandbox mode.
Progression game mode. Level up your character, buy equipment, and explore dungeons in the search for Crystal Shards and loot.

Select a wave to begin.
Use touchpad/thumbstick to scroll up or down.

For an optimal comfort and game experience make sure your height is well set.

Stand still, relaxed and click "Auto height":

Explore and progress through a semi-procedural dungeon.
Unlock new skills and equipment!
Select your Arena and fight (VRcade only).

Fight waves of foes in an arena to train and improve your skills.
Spoiler alert: All weapons and abilities are unlocked!

The Arena is a small map, best fitted to discover
Blade & Sorcery features!

Please select your game mod
(It can NOT be changed later!)

- Hips marker -
Move your waist tracker here

- Feet marker -
Move your feet trackers on each foot
Are you sure you want to delete your save?
Do you want to play the tutorial?
This hand cannot grab this object
Your controllers are not supported yet. Inputs may don't work correctly.
For more information about inputs, open the menu by pressing Y and go to the \"controller inputs\" section.
For more information about inputs, open the menu by pressing the left menu button while pressing touchpad center and go to the \"controller inputs\" section.
For more information about inputs, open the menu by pressing the left menu button and go to the \"controller inputs\" section.
For more information about inputs, open the menu by pressing B and go to the \"controller inputs\" section.
For more information about inputs, open the menu by pressing Y and go to the \"controller inputs\" section.

VR HMD not detected!
Only spectator mode is available.
Pressing the Push and Pull buttons at the same time will cause any item held with telekinesis to spin.
You can sweep the legs of enemies with long weapon handles.
You can use axes to slide down slanted ropes.
You gain focus by parrying enemy attacks.
When climbing, pressing the jump button at the top of a ledge will boost you up and over.
You can merge the gravity spell with both hands, then pull your hands apart to create a large gravity bubble.
Fire-imbued weapons can stab through metallic armors and stone.
Fireballs can be deflected with a well-timed gravity push.
You can shoot fireballs from a fire-imbued staff.
Smooth and steady strikes are more effective than hard and fast ones. Attacking too fast will break your attack.
You have four weapon slots on your body: Two on your hips and two on your back.
You can create a gravity explosion by slamming the terrain with a gravity-imbued staff.
Remove quivers by pressing down the trigger button and then the grip button to grab it.
You can slide your grip by holding down the trigger while you are holding a weapon.
Fireballs can be returned to the sender by deflecting them with a sword.
In sandbox mode, enemy armor can be disabled via the debug page in the book menu.
In sandbox mode, cheats such as infinite health, infinite mana, etc can be enabled via the sandbox page in the book menu.
Enemy limbs can be dismembered along the joints. It's easier to sever limbs with larger weapons than smaller ones.
Higher tiered weapons will retain an imbue for longer.
You can slide down ropes by grabbing onto them and then holding the trigger.
Enemy can be torn apart by grabbing two limbs with the gravity spell, and then slowly pulling apart.
Holding the jump button down will make you jump higher than if you tap it.
You can sprint by moving forward in-game while making a jogging motion with your arms in real life.
You can tweak the physics for sword handling in the options menu, but too much tweaking may lead to strange results!
When in slow motion, your physical strength is increased.
Slamming a Fire-imbued staff in the ground will fire off a swarm of homing fireballs!
You can merge two Fire spells to create a massive flaming meteor!
You can slow your fall by charging the Gravity spell.
Throwing the Gravity spell downwards, or in any direction, while airborne, will propel you in the opposite direction!
Lightning will chain electricity between metallic items!
Slam a Lightning-imbued staff to trigger a huge radial shockwave of lightning.
Press and release the alt-fire button while swinging a Fire-imbued staff to throw a combat fireball!
Press and release the alt-fire button while holding a Lightning-imbued staff to draw arcs of slicing lightning in the air!
Press and hold the alt-fire button while holding a Gravity-imbued staff to hover large items on the tip!
Zapping enemy weapons has a chance to disarm them!
Merge two Lightning spells, put your arms together, and spread your palms to devastate with a massive beam of lightning!
